commit.message: Review comment fixed: Updated error message
Review comments fixed: Removed unwanted blank lines, removed ENTER key press
Moved the test from JTextArea to JTextField which is more appropriate
Formatting changes, removed extra blank lines, rearranged methods order
Set the default number of columns in JTextField constructor, otherwise in linux platforms the column width is coming default as 0 and in turns fails the test
8282234: Create a regression test for JDK-4532513
